page.title: 11Local controversies
page.content:
There are two local controversies in this town. The first is a plan to build a car park on a piece of land called Swan Meadows. It is five minutes walk from the town centre. People like to go their to feed the ducks. Although it is of no great ecological importance it is pleasant to have a rural corner almost in the town centre. On the other hand parking is a problem.
The second controversy centres on the Parish Church. The choirmaster has been dismissed and the choir suspended and there is a contested plan by the church to sell the old rectory which is a listed building and build houses on the site.
